scripts.dev: bun run build && concurrently "bun run watch:renderer" "bun run start"
scripts.build: bun run build:main && bun run build:preload && bun run build:renderer
scripts.build:main: bun build src/main/index.ts --outdir dist/main --target node --external electron
scripts.build:preload: bun build src/preload/index.ts --outdir dist/preload --target node --external electron
scripts.build:renderer: bun run build:css && bun build src/renderer/index.tsx --outdir dist/renderer && cp src/renderer/index.html dist/renderer/
